Comment: It’s still just the cable news audience. The rest of the country has moved on to new media, as evidenced by Dem’s increasing voter share of the elderly.  Outreach is important, Dem’s don’t do it in meaningful ways to get new voters  who can stomach checking a box next to a D. People don’t want to return to the old Democratic Party, but when they do out of disgust for Trump and see nothing has changed, we’ll have a hard time winning in 28.
